title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/stassen_harry.html
notes: The Sarge and his buddies with Saddam Hussein's money in Iraq

We returns to the cabin for another week - no elektrickty of computers and that like so I will contact the guy when I gets back. We just stop to the village to get more niagara pills and some foods for us, and I check my computer mail at the e-mail cafe here in Spring Byington.
 
Later Blood.
 
Harold

I thought they were done with me when I sent it along to Scamorama because I hadn't heard anything from them in a long time. They did get back the third week in January (I guess scammers take holiday breaks, too.) And, they WOULDN'T SHUT UP! 

I've added two new characters who are mentioned in passing: Hans and Fritz Katzenjammer, the "boys" Harold sends $10,000 to to complete the transaction. 


And, I'd been watching "Chimes at Midnight" - Orson Welles' film in which he played Falstaff, so I included a couple lines just for the heck of it. The Lads didn't notice the references. And bastardized a couple quotes from "Casablanca" - watched that recently,too.

messages.subject: HELLO FRIEND:I NEED YOUR ASSISTANCE
messages.body:
I have a new email address! 
You can now email me at: sgt_paulharry@yahoo.in
 
- Dear Friend, 
My name is Sgt.Paul Harry, I am an American soldier with Swiss background, serving in the military with the army's 3rd infantry division. With a very desperate need for assistance, I have summed up courage to contact you. I found your contact particulars in an address journal. I am seeking your kind assistance to move the sum of ( $ 25 Million U.S. Dollars ) Twenty Five Million United State Dollars to you, as far as I can be assured that my share will be safe in your care until I complete my service here, this is no stolen money, and there are no danger involved.Source Of Money:Some money in various currencies was discovered in barrels at a farmhouse near one of Saddam's old palaces in Tikrit-Iraq during a rescue operation, and it was agreed by staff Sgt Kenneth buff and I that some part of this money be shared among both of us before informing anybody about it since both of us saw the money first. 

This was quite an illegal thing to do, but I tell you what? No! compensation can make up for the risk we have taken with our lives in this hell hole.The above figure was given to me as my share, and to conceal this kind of money became a problem for me, so with the help of a British contact working here and his office enjoy some immunity, I was able to get the package out to a safe location entirely out of trouble spot. he does not know the real contents of the package, and believes that it belongs to a brithish/american medical doctor who died in a raid here in Iraq, and before giving up, trusted me to hand over the package to his family.Now this where you come in this if you are willing to assist me in this transaction, the money has been packed as family valuables and it will be delivered to you in your country in two days, if you are willing to assist me in this venture you are advised to get back to me with your complete contact information which will be forwarded to the diplomat who is carrying the said consignment.He will contact you on your direct phone number from your international airport, aft er that the consignment will proceed to your home which is the final destination, note that it is not a must that you should assist me in this transaction but if you are willing and sincere to help me out in this transaction be rest assured that this transaction is 100% risk free and it does not contradict the laws of any country.Indicate your interest in assisting me as well as Providing your contactinformation to the smooth conclusion of this Transaction.

Sergeant Paul Harry,.
Camp MXP-512 Third Infantry Division Unit(T.I.D.U),
Abul Uruj, Baghdad, Iraq.

messages.body:
Herr Sgt.
 
I am in receipt of you letter and the contents duly noted. As a old soldier myssef I knows what is happened and what shall be in the wings! Be very careful, my friend - you say you trust somebody you do not know? As one who wore the uniform of my fatherland hissef and made sacrifice for it I warn you be careful! Never have trust in the British - look to Chruchill as a example - see?
 
It would be pleasurable to help you, but I am old and deaf and have no phone and do not think I could lift a box of such currencys - I pray for you to the god of war and wish you the best you can have.
 
With a Seig Heil for old time sake,
 
Hauptmann Harold Stassen, retired Wehrmacht Officer

messages.body:
Thank you, Reverend, for writing me. My friend the sargeant says you're a good christian and that is very nice, so I can trust you with some news that I have - the packages you will deliver for me and the sarge are full of moneys! Yes, from Sodom Hussain hisself! So do not worry about making the payments - when we gets the moneys we will have lots to spend for peoples and things, yes?
 
Let me know when you have time to come to the United States here - I will arrange to have a car sent for you and we will go for beer and sausages together with the moneys you deliver. Please come to the Midway Airport in Chicago - it is cheaper to rent cars there and it is near a good beer hall with pretty girls, OK?
 
Harold
 
See you soon.

God bless

Sgt Paul harry

Dear Harold Stassen

This is in receipt of your mail which the content was well understood, my dear brother I did not contact a clergy man on you behalf,  is the operational manager of HGC DIPLOMATIC COURIER COMPANY LONDON UK. Like i told you in one of my previous mail that the fund was packaged as a family valuable goods and shipped to London with the help of the above diplomatic courier company. The consignment was locked with a code; know one has the access code to the very consignment except me. Presently the consignment is laying in there security vault until I instruct the company to release it to my next of kin. I wrote the diplomatic company and told them about you and they have started making arrangement on when the consignment will be delivered to you, but you will need to apply to them with your contact address so that they will know were to deliver the consignment to. I want to assure you that you have nothing to worry about as this transaction is 100 percent risk free and does not contravene the law of any land.

You will open the consignment upon arrival of the diplomat in your home and access the content, my brother; I repeat that you must access the consignment before the diplomat who will be assigned to deliver the consignment will leave your home. You will take 30% of the total sum; 10percent will be mapped out for any expenses you must have incurred as a result of completing this transaction, while the remaining 60% will be for me, I hope it is fair deal, you can tell me your mind on this.

Finally, I want you to comply with the instruction of the diplomat so that the consignment will be delivered to you without any further delay.

Thanks as I wait your urgent response.

Sgt Paul Harry.

messages.body:
Sarge:
 
Soon I will leave for the airport in Chicago to fly to Houston and THEN I will meet this man for his face. This is the way of me to see things straite on and not to be confused by other persons. I have trust in you, young man, but you ARE a young man and can make very foolish mistakes for you can not see deceet in peoples at your age. I have lived for 96 years by my wits and cunning - it served me well in battle to have cautious - and I recomend this for you also too.
 
It is God sent that this "Reverend" should go for Houston - I go there today to play big-time poker in the Horst Wessel Invitational Tournament where first prize is $2.5 Million dollars for winning, and I am a good poker player for I have won much. You may seen me on television at cards - they calls me "Schweinfurter Slim" and I am popular. I have also sent you a picture of me playing last year at the Big Game in Breslau - do not worry. The same skill that lets me see into the soul of men at the poker table will help me to understand this "Reverend" is you wish me to not call him names.
 
He knows he is to come to my hotel today post noon for exchange of stuff, so I will have news for you at the then, so stay calm and relaxable until I writ you then times.
 
Herr Stassen

messages.body:
Sergant:
 
I will check with this new guy on Monday - then will I writ. I hope he is not as silly as the last guy. He must come only when I tell him, and not wast his time and my moneys. I new he was not a experienced diplamot, and I betcha and give you odds of 7 to 3 that he is no reverend too.
 
Take care youseff in the war. I know what goes in a soldier head when he in a war zone and I have some hints about this experiences. They say "Never to volunteer" but this is not true. Volunteers when you can because it is much easier than you think, just do not be afraid when you do, and if you do try this. Whenever I feel afraid I hold my head erect and whistle a happy tune So no one will suspect I'm afraid. While shivering in my shoes I strike a careless pose And whistle a happy tune and no one ever knows I'm afraid. The result of this deception is very strange to tell for when I fool the people I fear I fool myself as well! I whistle a happy tune and ev'ry single time the happiness in the tune convinces me that I'm not afraid. Make believe you're brave and the trick will take you far. You may be as brave as you make believe you are. This helps me at the poker games also too. It was just that ever time I whistles at the table the other guys new that I was afraid - this was a tell on me so I don't whistle no more, but I used to. Anyway, I cannot hear it no more anyhow.
 
I will writ soon.
 
Harold

messages.body:
Wetterlage
Tief 'Verena' ber Sdfrankreich sorgt mit einer sdlichen Strmung fr teils dichtere Wolken in Deutschland

Sonntag
Heute bleibt es im Norden Deutschlands vielfach stark bewlkt oder bedeckt und rtlich fallen ein paar Tropfen, dazu weht hier weiter oft frischer und biger Sdostwind. Sonst ist neben lockerer bis wechselnder Bewlkung auch etwas Sonnenschein mglich und es bleibt berwiegend trocken. Es werden 1 Grad am Fichtelgebirge bis 6 Grad im Rheinland und auf einigen Nordseeinseln erreicht. In der Nacht zum Montag ist es in der Nordhlfte berwiegend dicht bewlkt und es kann rtlich etwas Nieselregen fallen. In der Sdhlfte des Landes ist es dagegen meist aufgelockert bewlkt, teils auch neblig, und trocken. Die Straen knnen vor Allem durch Rauhreif glatt sein. Der Wind weht berwiegend mig, an den norddeutschen Ksten auch frisch aus stlichen Richtungen. Die Temperaturen gehen auf 5 Grad auf einzelnen Nordseeinseln bis -3 Grad an der Schwbischen Alb zurck.

Harold

messages.body:
I am back and very full of angers at my "dearest " so do not mention about her anymore times, OK? She runned off during the night some night ago and took with her the moneys I had having and my clothes too! I find from friends she has gone back to her tourist business in the United Kingdom in the resort city of Brighton where she sells seas shells by the seashore, so I will be going there very soon to, as we say, "get even." While there I will visit with the  because he is in London which is very near to Brighton and I will have to fly to the Heathrow Airport there to get to Brighton.
 
I have a favor to ask of him and mainly of you, my fellow soldier. I cannot bring any guns on the airplane for the reasons they are afraid of peoples there with guns on the plane so can you please arrange with the  to have one ready for me? I will need this when I see  again and will reward you hansomley for doing this and if I get caught I will not say who has given it to me. Please let me know of this as soon as you may, for I will head to London before the Christmas season ends.
 
Much appreciations,
 
Your friend and fellow soldier,
 
Harold

I find from friends she has gone back to her tourist business in the United Kingdom in the resort city of Brighton where she sells seas shells by the seashore, so I will be going there very soon to, as we say, "get even." While there I will visit with the diplomat Anthony White because he is in London which is very near to Brighton and I will have to fly to the Heathrow Airport there to get to Brighton.

I have a favor to ask of him and mainly of you, my fellow soldier. I cannot bring any guns on the airplane for the reasons they are afraid of peoples there with guns on the plane so can you please arrange with the Diplomat Anthony to have one ready for me? I will need this when I see Leni again and will reward you hansomley for doing this and if I get caught I will not say who has given it to me. Please let me know of this as soon as you may, for I will head to London before the Christmas season ends.

Much appreciations,

Your friend and fellow soldier,

Harold

messages.body:
Sarge:
 
You make jokes at me, do you not? You jest and think youseff funny, is this so? I do not like it. Men of all sorts take a pride to gird at me: the brain of this foolish-compounded clay, man, is not able to invent anything that tends to laughter, more than I invent or is invented on me: I am not only witty in myself, but the cause that wit is in other men.
 
I have gone through much troubles about you and the diplomatic guys you say are to bring me moneys. Now I am in preparation to go to the United England once again to visit with that treacherous wench  and do not wish distractions with you or you diplomats or you  who does not show with the gun you promised to me. I have several Abwehr friends who can get me my pistol though I will have to pay dearly for it, it will be of worth to my immoral soul to take care of this wretch of a wench! I'll see her damned first; to Pluto's damned lake, by this hand, to the infernal deep, with Erebus and tortures vile also. Hold hook and line, say I. Down, down, dogs! down, faitors! Have we not Hiren here?

if you have decent informations, writ it to me, in the other cases, keep you head down.
 
HS

So where did you go? I have been awaiting you so long I finally went for my own breakfast of sausages and eggs made with good beer. See what you miss?
 
I have doubtings of you - you are no better than the other guy  sended, the "" who didn't know how to go through Texas none either. and what did he try to pull on me? He says I have $2900 to pay to him, and you tell me it is only $600 USD dollars! There is something not right that I am seeing of this. Did this  try to take extra moneys for hissef, or are you a bogus? I am thinking this: do you remember the movie called "Casablancka" with Humphrey Bergman and Ingrid Bogart? The one where he says to the guy "Sam, play that song another time for me, okay." There is a place where he says to the little guy, "I do not mind a parasite, it is a cut rate parasite that I objects to, you bet." Well, I think you are like that little guy played by Peter Greenstreet - are you a cut rate guy? Trying to get a few of my many USD for you? I will writ to the  and say that a bollux you guys from the "Diplamat Company" make of this whole transsactions.
 
You have created much disappointments in me - a old man who must tell a fellow soldier that the world again does not appreciation of our efforts for them.
 
Harold Stassen

messages.body:
You have troubles with the diplamats you send


Sgt Paul:
 
The Diplamat Anthony has writ to me and says he will meet me in Texas where I make moneys playing poker against the rich guys with cows and oil. He does not show up for me and I have to eat alone. Tonight I go out with both the ladies I had planned to go out with one of them so he could have the other one  These diplamats you go to are no good - they try to take the moneys you have found in Irak for theysefs, do you see? Get you stuff back from these guys and bring it home youseff when you get out from the army you are in. I care for you wellfair and will share you a secret way I get out of going to Stalingrad when I was going to go there: tell the doktor in your regiment that you enjoy watching the other soldier boys when they take showers after being out in the desert all day - do you get it? They do not want this kind of thing to happen when in war, so they will send you to the rear quick. Do this so  you will not get killed in the desert like I sometimes almost got killed in Afrika with Rommel. Do this and you will be okay to spend what it is you have found for youseff, while I will wish happy things for you in the near.
 
Many good lucks,
 
A old soldier,
 
Harold.

messages.body:
Sgt:
 
What is in your impliactions? "Anthony White is a CUTE NICE GUY" - what mean you? If you thinks bringing up that old charge from Tobruk of me and Hauptmann Faygala is going to provocation you wrong, bozo! This was misunderstanding because even though he too was cute he was very butch and not for my liking, if I did that sort of thing, OK? I tell you of the showering thing the last for give you out from army if you wish. Do not think this of me every time for I have had womens around the whole Reich, even at the height of our victories and still do. The thing with Leni makes me mad enough for to get guns and I will settle this soon, but I will replace her with another woman, OK?
 
He writ to me to say he is going to be here, then he has writ again to say he is delayed in London for moneys - what kind of guys did you hire? What do they charge you for they services? I know some peoples in Europa who could do this thing for you and do it for me and do it for cheap and you will have you money and we be done with this thing that takes so long. You wastes time, mister, and at 96 years of old I have not time for waste.
 
Get rid of the diplomat guys - tell  me to contact Hans and Fritz Katzenjammer and we will get this thing over and done. In the otherwise, you on you own and leave me alone, do you have this?
 
Harold Stassen

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Harold,

I received your email and the  content well noted I like to bring to your notice that inability to meet you up in Texas as agreed was due to ban place on your consignment by the home land security here in LODON demanding the sum of $600 for issuance of clearing permit.

I want you to understand here that as soon you send the $600 I proceed with consignment to your home.

I hope to hearing from you soon

Diplomat Anthony White.

messages.body:
Sgt:
 
You are a sorry little boy - yes, this is what I say! You are small-time person who will risk millions to save hundreds. The diplomat persons you have chose do not cost much, but look at the results they have for you - nothing, NOTHING! We have been writing to you and me for months and what do we have to show for our writing? Does my point get to you?
 
I have no game, little boy. I hire professional persons who do as they say and do not ponce around between the Untied Kingdom and Amerika for joy riding. Several times I have appointments with you "diplomatics" and they do not show - why is this? Because they are amateurs and do not know their bottoms from hub caps! I work much with Hans and Fritz over the years and when they takes a job it is done when they takes it because they good. The saying goes "You get what you money buys" applies to this - for you save a couple bucks and have nothing, do you see? These men do not fail - it is them who get me my Walther PPK in the UK and this is the way I settle with  - she is kaput and so are you and me.
 
If you wish to keep playing with you diplomat boys you can do so - leave me to myseff and grow up, little boy!
 
Harold

Harold Stassen to Sgt.Paul Harry
Sent: Thu 2/19/09

If you wish to keep playing with you diplomat boys you can do so - leave me to myseff and grow up, little boy! Harold

Paul Harry

messages.body:
Sgt:
 
Do not speak to me from big horses! I, as a old soldier, wish to help another soldier, but this one is young and stupid, and that is you!
 
Look to the results of our dealings together: you have diplomats who come to this country and do nothing here but they time because they stupid and cheap - they takes you moneys because they are not professionels like the mens I go to. The Katzenjammer boys are good - they get results for me many times, the last time for  - look here:
http://www.crispinsartwell.com/leni.htm
Can you "Diplomatics" say the same for me? No siree can they.
 
I tries to help you once again - do not trust these guys no matter what they calls theyseffs for you will only lose much moneys. The reason I can be a gambler at my age is because I knows peoples and can tell very soon what in they souls and this you does not do good. I am happy of you promotion - you will get more moneys and prestige, but I have concerns for you soldiers for you is naiveness itseff. They is taking from you more than you have thought of you bet. This chuckle head boy pays for his airplane ride but does not have $600 hissef? What that tell to you? $600 is food for chickens to me - I light cigars with $100 bills sometimes when I smoke cigars so this can be spent by me in one evening, you see?
 
Now you have the rank you can get this stuff sent to you home by youseff and do not need me no more. Many lucks in the future for you and especial you troops - I hope they do not wind up like the guys in Stalingrad for this would be terribly bad for them.
 
Good by to you,
 
Harold.
